author: Staff Reporter
text:
The police on Sunday arrested a man who allegedly dug out the body of a 45-year-old woman from her grave and “raped” her in Lal Darwaza area of Fatehpur Sikri on Friday. The accused, identified as Rajendra from the same locality, was arrested after widespread protests by local residents.

The incident triggered tension when the grave of the woman who had died on Friday after prolonged illness was found desecrated. The matter came to light when her family members visited the grave to offer flowers. The local administration had deployed police personnel in the area fearing riots.

According to the police, the family members of the deceased found the dead body naked. A pair of trousers and a pouch of liquor were found inside the grave.

The angry crowd alleged that the body was “raped” but police said it could be confirmed only after forensic tests. The body was reburied only after a senior official reached the spot and assured the crowd of immediate action. A case has been registered at the Fatehpur Sikri police station.
title: Woman’s body dug out, violated in Uttar Pradesh
